name: Clicks and Robbers
description:
Work with your crew to steal every dollar the bank has. Buy upgrades and execute heists with perfect timing to increase the amount each heist pulls. An active play completion can be finished within 5-10 minutes for most players.

*Sound effects for your crew are disabled at 15+ crew members for everyone's sanity.

Controls:
    => Mouse - Left-mouse button
Notable Mechanics:
    => Every X period a target will appear on the vault, click that target to multiply your earnings further.

Thanks for playing!

An idle/clicker game created for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023 between April 2nd and April 12th.

Theme: Another Direction
Typical clicker games focus on increasing a value until reaching some threshold to hit your victory condition. This game embraces Another Direction by asking the player to decrease a value to 0 to achieve victory.

Code for this project can be found here: https://github.com/billbobphil/ClickerJam2023
